014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.util.Objects;
017
018public class DefaultCreation<I> implements AutoCloseableRegistry, Creation<I> {
019
020  private final AutoCloseableRegistry registry;
021
022  private final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria;
023
024  public DefaultCreation(final AutoCloseableRegistry registry) {
025    this(registry, null);
026  }
027
028  public DefaultCreation(final AutoCloseableRegistry registry,
029                         final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
030    super();
031    this.registry = Objects.requireNonNull(registry, "registry");
032    this.beanSelectionCriteria = beanSelectionCriteria;
033  }
034
035  @Override // Creation<I>
036  public BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria() {
037    return beanSelectionCriteria;
038  }
039
040  @Override // Creation<I>
041  public void created(final I instance) {
042    // TODO:
043  }
044
045  @Override // AutoCloseableRegistry
046  public DefaultCreation<I> clone() {
047    return this.clone(this.beanSelectionCriteria());
048  }
049
050  @Override // Creation<I>
051  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
052  public DefaultCreation<I> clone(final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria) {
053    return new DefaultCreation<>(this.registry.clone(), beanSelectionCriteria);
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public final void close() {
058    this.registry.close();
059  }
060
061  @Override
062  public final boolean closed() {
063    return this.registry.closed();
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public final boolean register(final AutoCloseable ac) {
068    return this.registry.register(ac);
069  }
070
071}
